text: short a [ 99 ] [ 100 ] ; short max ( short a , short b ) { if ( a >= b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { short t , n , i , j , k , maxs ; scanf ( "%hd" , & t ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%hd" , & n ) ; scanf ( "%hd" , & a [ 0 ] [ 1 ] ) ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) for ( k = 1 ; k <= j + 1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%hd" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; a [ j ] [ k ] += max ( a [ j - 1 ] [ k - 1 ] , a [ j - 1 ] [ k ] ) ; } maxs = a [ n - 1 ] [ 1 ] ; for ( j = 2 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) if ( a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] > maxs ) maxs = a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; printf ( "%hd\n" , maxs ) ; } return 0 ; }
